meta_description: SudokQuizz mixes Sudoku and general-knowledge quizzes. Free on Google Play.
title: SudokQuizz
tag: Sudoku + Quiz — train your logic and knowledge
lead: Solve grids, answer quizzes and train your brain. Free on Google Play.
about_text: SudokQuizz blends Sudoku with general-knowledge quiz questions. Pick a difficulty, solve the grid and unlock jokers by watching short rewarded videos.
